content.name: Population
content.desc: People, their living arrangements and where they come from.

variables.name: Marital status
variables.desc: People married or in civil partnerships.

classifications.desc: People married or in civil partnerships.

categories.name: Single never married or in a civil partnership
categories.legend_str_3: single never married or in a civil partnership

categories.name: Widowed or surviving civil partnership partner
categories.legend_str_3: widowed or surviving civil partnership partner

variables.name: Families living in the same home
variables.desc: Types of families living in the same home.

classifications.desc: Types of families living in the same home.

variables.name: Length of time people have lived in the UK
variables.desc: People born or have moved to the UK.

classifications.desc: People born or have moved to the UK.

content.name: Education
content.desc: People in education and qualifications they hold.

variables.name: Highest level of qualification gained
variables.desc: Highest qualification gained by residents.

classifications.desc: Highest qualification gained by residents.

content.name: Housing
content.desc: Types of homes and the people living in them.

variables.name: Size of household
variables.desc: Number of people who usually live together in the same home.

classifications.desc: Number of people who usually live together in the same home.

variables.name: Type of home
variables.desc: Types of homes people live in.

classifications.desc: Types of homes people live in.

variables.name: Number of bedrooms
variables.desc: The number of dedicated bedrooms in a home

classifications.desc: The number of dedicated bedrooms in a home

variables.name: Owned or renting
variables.desc: People that live in a home they rent or own.

classifications.desc: People that live in a home they rent or own.

variables.name: Car or van availability
variables.desc: People living in the same home that have use of or own a car or van.

classifications.desc: People living in the same home that have use of or own a car or van.

variables.name: Heating
variables.desc: Types of central heating available for use in the home.

classifications.desc: Types of central heating available for use in the home.

categories.name: Solid fuel central heating (for example wood, coal)
categories.legend_str_3: solid fuel central heating (for example wood, coal)

categories.name: Two or more types of central heating
categories.legend_str_3: two or more types of central heating

variables.name: Residence type
variables.desc: Families and other groups living in the same home or communal establishment.

classifications.desc: Families and other groups living in the same home or communal establishment.

variables.name: Economic activity
variables.desc: People who are in work, starting work, looking for or do not work.

classifications.desc: People who are in work, starting work, looking for or do not work.

variables.name: Working hours
variables.desc: Hours people work per week.

classifications.desc: Hours people work per week.

variables.name: Job
variables.desc: The types of jobs people do or did.

classifications.desc: The types of jobs people do or did.

variables.name: Travel to work
variables.desc: Types of transport people use to travel to work.

classifications.desc: Types of transport people use to travel to work.

categories.name: London Underground, metro, light rail, or tram
categories.legend_str_3: london Underground, metro, light rail, or tram

variables.name: Distance travelled to work
variables.desc: The daily distance travelled to work.

classifications.desc: The daily distance travelled to work.

categories.name: Other
categories.legend_str_3: work offshore, outside of UK or at no fixed location

content.name: Health
content.desc: People's general health and caring responsibilities.

variables.name: General health
variables.desc: How people rate their general health.

classifications.desc: How people rate their general health.

variables.name: Long-term conditions
variables.desc: How people's health affects their day-to-day activities.

classifications.desc: How people's health affects their day-to-day activities.

variables.name: Unpaid care
variables.desc: People who provide unpaid care.

classifications.desc: People who provide unpaid care.

categories.name: Provide 1 to 19 hours unpaid care a week
categories.legend_str_3: provide 1 to 19 hours unpaid care a week

categories.name: Provide 20 to 49 hours unpaid care a week
categories.legend_str_3: provide 20 to 49 hours unpaid care a week

categories.name: Provide 50 or more hours unpaid care a week
categories.legend_str_3: provide 50 or more hours unpaid care a week

content.name: Identity
content.desc: How people identify themselves and their beliefs.

variables.name: Ethnicity
variables.desc: People who feel they belong to an ethnic group.

classifications.desc: People who feel they belong to an ethnic group.

categories.name: Mixed/multiple ethnic group: White and Black Caribbean
categories.legend_str_3: mixed/multiple ethnic group: White and Black Caribbean

categories.name: Mixed/multiple ethnic group: White and Black African
categories.legend_str_3: mixed/multiple ethnic group: White and Black African

categories.name: Mixed/multiple ethnic group: White and Asian
categories.legend_str_3: mixed/multiple ethnic group: White and Asian

categories.name: Other ethnic group: Any other ethnic group
categories.legend_str_3: other ethnic group: Any other ethnic group

variables.name: Ethnic groups living together
variables.desc: The mixture of ethnic groups in a single household.

classifications.desc: The mixture of ethnic groups in a single household.

categories.name: All household members from the same ethnic group
categories.legend_str_3: all household members from the same ethnic group

categories.name: Different ethnic groups between the generations only
categories.legend_str_3: different ethnic groups between the generations only

categories.name: Any other combination of multiple ethnic groups
categories.legend_str_3: any other combination of multiple ethnic groups

variables.name: Religion and beliefs
variables.desc: People's religion and beliefs.

classifications.desc: People's religion and beliefs.

categories.name: Other religion
categories.legend_str_3: do not follow one of the main religions

variables.name: Country of birth
variables.desc: People born in or outside the UK.

classifications.desc: People born in or outside the UK.

categories.name: Other Europe
categories.legend_str_3: Europe (excluding The United Kingdom or Ireland).

categories.name: The Americas and the Caribbean
categories.legend_str_3: North and South America or the Caribbean.

variables.name: Understand, speak, read or write Welsh
variables.desc: People that speak, read or write Welsh.

classifications.desc: People that speak, read or write Welsh.

categories.name: Can speak, read or write Welsh
categories.legend_str_3: can speak, read or write Welsh

variables.name: Household deprivation
variables.desc: Households that are deprived in the 4 dimentions of: Employment, Education, Health and disability, and Household overcrowding

classifications.desc: Households that are deprived in the 4 dimentions of: Employment, Education, Health and disability, and Household overcrowding
